Because JUnit is under IBM public license 
(http://oss.software.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/license10.html), 
I think that there are some issues in using their source code (since the 
test runners are not in the published API).

However, with the help of TestListener and TestResult, which are both 
published, you can create your own test runner without bothering the 
source code.

Shane
